text.section: The committee shall provide ongoing advice and input to the board regarding the criteria for licensure and the ratio between consumer demand and the existing supply of licensed interpreters or those eligible for licensure.
The committee shall make recommendations to the board regarding the content of relevant administrative regulations.

The committee shall provide ongoing review of professional development and support systems for interpreters including existing public and private education programs and training resources within the Commonwealth.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998.
